channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two extremely large and dangerous potholes, 4th April
item.description:
Two extremely large, deep, potholes right on blind junction, causing cars to utilize otherside/middle of road on a blind junction. It is unavoidable to prevent hitting at least one of them and they are going to cause some serious issues. Need repairig asap please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 294 Swindon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please arrange for the dog poo bin, 3rd April
item.description:
… to be emptied. Thank you!

item.title: Sunken drain covers x 2, 3rd April
item.description:
The drain covers have large holes roughly 8 inches deep, ive blown a tyre when hitting one
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Woodfold Cottage Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley

item.title: Lots of potholes, 2nd April
item.description:
These potholes have been here for months now and it’s dangerous when turning into the road. There have been other reports which is why I’ve not reported before but they’ve been there for a long time with no action.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11a Elmfield Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous Potholes Hearne Way, 2nd April
item.description:
Numerous VERY DEEP potholes. Over 75mm deep. Been there far too long. Traffic always parked along one side therefore hard to avoid. Very close to a school and two nursing homes/retirement homes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Hearne Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 2nd April
item.description:
Drain needs clearing. Compacted silt.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Chase Avenue, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just fixed potholes and there again, 2nd April
item.description:
Please can somebody explain to me why you keep sending cowboy tarmac repair people out to fix these potholes. There are now a collection of potholes which are dangerous. They put tarmac into the holes and tamp it. They don’t remove any of the aggregate that had come out previously which is being flicked up and damaging cars. Absolute joke!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Owls End Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 2nd April
item.description:
There are several potholes on the roundabout by the Barnett Way junction, big enough that they must be avoided which is likely to lead to an accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Barnett Way, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet
